text: Geoffrey Ian Allott was born 24 December, 1971 in Christchurch. He was a New Zealand cricketer who played 10 tests and 31 one-day internationals from 1996 till 2000 before retiring from cricket following series of injuries. He is the fourth cousin to Derek Stirling and Cameron Brewer. ==Other websites== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Christchurch
title: Geoff Allott
